string-array.name: search_orb_text_to_show
string-array.item: "Vaicājiet “What's the Giants score?” (“Kāds ir Giants rezultāts?”)."
"Vaicājiet “What's the Knicks score?” (“Kāds ir Knicks rezultāts?”)."
"Vaicājiet “What's the Red Wings score?” (“Kāds ir Red Wings rezultāts?”)."
"Vaicājiet “What's the Seahawks score?” (“Kāds ir Seahawks rezultāts?”)."
"Vaicājiet “What's the weather in New York?” (“Kādi ir laikapstākļi Ņujorkā?”)."
"Vaicājiet “What's the weather in San Francisco?” (“Kādi ir laikapstākļi Sanfrancisko?”)."
"Vaicājiet “What's the weather in Paris?” (“Kādi ir laikapstākļi Parīzē?”)."
"Vaicājiet “What's the weather in Cozumel?” (“Kādi ir laikapstākļi Kozumelā?”)."
Vaicājiet “How tall is Brad Pitt?” (“Cik garš ir Breds Pits?”).
Vaicājiet “How hot is the sun?” (“Cik karsta ir saule?”).
Vaicājiet “When was John Wayne born?” (“Kad ir dzimis Džons Veins?”).
Izrunājiet komandu “open Play Movies” (“atvērt Play filmas”).
